attributes.action: The Sue Gray full report is published in full after police enquiry concludes.
attributes.additional_details: The British public have a right to the information contained within the full, un-redacted version of the Sue Gray report.  This report should not be withheld from the British public given the circumstances in which the enquiry revolves.
attributes.background: After the police enquiry into the parties at No 10 has concluded, I would like the full Sue Gray report to the published to the British public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
